name: documentation_download
label: FALSE
note: Functions as a link to download documentation (not a viewer)

name: download
label: TRUE
note: Link to download file (for multiple files see the multiple downloads guidelines)

name: full_layer_description
label: FALSE
note: To view further descriptive information about the layer or a link to its landing page

name: iiif_image
reference_type: International Image Interoperability Framework (IIIF) Image API
label: FALSE
note: Load the image viewer using Leaflet-IIIF

name: iiif_manifest
reference_type: International Image Interoperability Framework (IIIF) Presentation API Manifest
label: FALSE
note: View the IIIF manifest - uses the Clover viewer by default https://samvera-labs.github.io/clover-iiif/docs

name: metadata_fgdc
label: FALSE
note: Provides an HTML view of an XML file in the FGDC standard

name: metadata_html
label: FALSE
note: View structured metadata in any standard expressed as HTML

name: metadata_iso
label: FALSE
note: Provides an HTML view of an XML file in the ISO 19139 standard

name: metadata_mods
label: FALSE
note: Provides a raw XML view of metadata in the MODS format

name: open_index_map
label: FALSE
note: Provides an interactive preview of a GeoJSON file formatted as an OpenIndexMap

name: wfs
label: FALSE
note: Provides a to download generated vector datasets (GeoJSON, shapefile)

name: wmts
label: FALSE
note: Provides a service to visually preview a layer and inspect its features

name: xyz_tiles
label: FALSE
note: Link to an XYZ tile server
